name: Vimal Enterprises
overview:
“Vimal Enterprises,” was established in the year 2009, at Pune (Maharashtra, India). Our organization is successfully ranked amongst the top manufacturer and supplier of Medical Equipment, Fabrication and Job Work for Precision Components.

Infrastructure: Our organization is blessed with the vast infrastructure spread across 1200 sq ft and that is equipped with the advanced machines, tools and equipment in order to manufacture high grade products. This wide infrastructure is divided into different sub-departments such as production, quality control, R&D and warehousing & packaging.

Team: We have recruited a hardworking and skilled team of professionals that is a crucial asset of our organization. Our experienced professionals enable us to earn the remarkable position in the domain by offering superior quality products. All the members of our proficient squad work in close co-ordination and communication to accomplish the specified requirements of the industry.

Quality Assurance: Being a quality centric organization; we are involved in offering world class Medical Equipment, Fabrication and Job Work for Precision Components. We develop these products using high grade raw material and latest technology as per the international standards.

Client Satisfaction: Working with the various flexible methods and skilled professionals, we succeed in meeting the exact requirements of the clients through our efficient facilities for customization of products.
